para.text: is replaced in the dialog by the actual unit being used for the X–axis. Typically, the value is zero, and this is the default value.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: When you are designing many motions it is frequently the case that all the motions cannot start at 0º. Some motions may need to start with a segment before or after this point.
